title: Opinion: Kona Bikes Relaunch – A Return to an Age of Passion over Profit?
content:
The Kona bikes relaunch is just the latest of a string of bike brands coming back to passionate leaders with a focus on the long run.

Read the full article at Opinion: Kona Bikes Relaunch – A Return to an Age of Passion over Profit? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
